attributes.action: Force telecommunications companies to actively prevent scam telephone calls
attributes.additional_details: The impact of these calls in elderly and vulnerable people is appalling. This form of fraud is something that needs to be stopped.
attributes.background: Pass legislation to force telecom firms to implement technologies to prevent and detect scam call centres and automated fishing systems many of which use fake generated numbers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which calls for the same actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559402
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329688
